overview: Pavel is co-founder and CTO of Rollbase responsible for overall development of the platform and has more than 20 years of experience creating enterprise software. Before Rollbase he was co-founder and CTO of Recruitforce.com, which was acquired by Taleo in 2005 and subsequently by Oracle in 2012. Now known as Oracle Taleo Business Edition Cloud Service, the Recruitforce product is currently used by over 5,000 organizations worldwide. Pavel also spent several years as an engineer and architect at Merryl Lynch. He is co-author of six Java books including Manning’s “Swing” and “Swing, 2nd edition” with Matt Robinson. Pavel has a PhD in Theoretical Physics from Moscow State University (MSU).
